title: october 3: if it doesn’t fit…
description:
It was a theater performance streamed across the nation. Millions of viewers tuned in to watch the trial of O.J. Simpson, a former football star, be prosecuted for the murder of his ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and her friend Ronald Goldman. In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares the details of court actions against O.J. Simpson that left him stalled in his career, a running joke for decades, and leading a police chase through Los Angeles. In the theme of people being stalled in their career, Maia shares headlines about the retaliation Irish singer Sinead O’Connor made when she ripped up a picture of Pope John Paul II while performing on Saturday Night Live. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
